title.en: Cinque Terre Maps 2025 | Hiking Trails, Villages & Transportation

description.en: Detailed maps of Cinque Terre including hiking trails, villages, train stations, beaches, viewpoints, and transportation connections.

title.it: Mappe e Orientamento per le Cinque Terre

subtitle.en: Detailed maps of hiking trails, villages, train connections, beaches, viewpoints, and all essential locations for your visit
subtitle.it: Mappe interattive, cartografie dei sentieri, planimetrie dei villaggi e guide geografiche per esplorare ogni angolo delle Cinque Terre senza perderti.

description.en: Detailed layouts of all five villages with landmarks, restaurants, hotels, beaches, and viewpoints
description.it: Rete completa dei 120 km di sentieri con difficolt√†, tempi di percorrenza, dislivelli, punti d'acqua.

description.en: Sentiero Azzurro, sanctuary paths, high routes with distances, elevations, and difficulty ratings
description.it: Mappe dettagliate dei 5 borghi con punti di interesse, ristoranti, servizi, stazioni, spiagge.

description.en: Train stations, ferry ports, bus stops, and connections between villages and nearby towns
description.it: Mappa ferroviaria con orari, traghetti stagionali, bus locali, collegamenti regionali.

description.en: Best viewpoints, iconic vistas, sunrise/sunset locations, and photography opportunities marked
description.it: Dove lasciare l'auto, ZTL, parcheggi a pagamento, navette, aree sosta camper.

description.en: Restaurants, cafes, markets, ATMs, pharmacies, and essential services in each village
description.it: Mappa delle spiagge, calette, punti di accesso al mare, piattaforme per tuffi, aree snorkeling.

description.en: Print-friendly maps and offline resources for hiking and exploring without mobile coverage
description.it: I migliori spot fotografici, terrazze panoramiche, belvedere, orari di luce ottimale.

description.en: Get detailed information about transportation, hiking trails, and getting to Cinque Terre
